body_html: TFGAN is fundamentally functional, and a number of TF-Eager paradigms are class-based. I think making TFGAN eager-compatible would require basically a re-write of the library, so we're not going to actively pursue this.
body_text: TFGAN is fundamentally functional, and a number of TF-Eager paradigms are class-based. I think making TFGAN eager-compatible would require basically a re-write of the library, so we're not going to actively pursue this.
body: TFGAN is fundamentally functional, and a number of TF-Eager paradigms are class-based. I think making TFGAN eager-compatible would require basically a re-write of the library, so we're not going to actively pursue this.
